item.title: The Return of Digg, a Star of Web 2.0
item.description: Two decades after creating Digg, a community-focused social message board, Kevin Rose is reviving the site and teaming up with a founder of Reddit.

item.title: In the Trump Era, King Charles Has a New and Very Delicate Role to Play
item.description: As he welcomed the leaders of Ukraine and Canada to his country estate this week, the king was sending a message to the world.
